title: Buji Ma Buji Ma Lyrics Sakalakala Vallavan Appatakkar Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Buji Ma Buji Ma
Singer(s): M.M.Monissha & D.Imman
Movie:Â Sakalakala Vallavan Appatakkar

Hey Buji ma Buji ma chella kutti Buji ma
mama unna bajji poda poraan
Podu sakka podu podu
Podu cycle gap il podu

Oh rettai jadai rettai jadai raakamma
Ah rettai pulla pethakanum kelamma
Maman kitta mutham ketka ayyo vetkama

Podu sakka podu podu
Podu cycle gap il podu

Oh rettai jadai rettai jadai raakamma
oh rettai pulla venuma
Hey aasa vachi kaathiruka athai ponnu paaruda
Nee meesa kuthi mel uthatil moonu thayyal poduda
Hey vetkathuku leave vittu kandapadi kattipudi
Vedikalaam naattu vedi de

Hey Buji ma Buji ma chella kutti Buji ma
mama unna bajji poda poraan
Hey Buji ma Buji ma chella kutti Buji ma
mama unna bajji poda poraan

Podu sakka podu podu
Podu cycle gap il podu

Lip kulla kappal vida readya
En uthadu aasapattu ketkudhey ketkudhey
Thappu thanda panna venaa badava
En uthadu acha pattu ketkudhey ketkudhey
Illa inu sonna adhu yes dhan
Vera enna inimey kiss dhan kiss dhan
Idhu oru pudhu sadu gudu dhan da
Moochadikki kotta naama thodalaama
Idhu oru pudhu adai mazhai dhan de
Odayila kappal senju vidalaama
Hey pacha kodi kaatiputten pichikittu poyen da
En kannu kaadhu mooku ellam
mutha mazhai penchu ippo mothamaaga nenayuren da

Hey Buji ma Buji ma chella kutti Buji ma
mama unna bajji poda poraan
Hey Buji ma Buji ma chella kutti Buji ma
mama unna bajji poda poraan
